Resignation of S. Korean "minister of national defense" demanded 
    Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Members of three civic organizations including the headquarters of the movement for the return of the U.S. forces base in Ryongsan held a rally in front of the gate of the building of the "Ministry of National Defense" on December 15 demanding the minister apologize for having approved the plan to build apartment houses in the base and step down at once, according to Radio No. 1 from Seoul.
 Charging that the ministry's approval of the construction project is an act of unilaterally favouring the U.S. forces' side in defiance of the demand of the South Korean people, they demanded the cancellation of the plan to build apartment houses in the U.S. forces bases in Phyongthaek, Osan, etc.
